summary: Analyzed shift-closed canonical Omega approach. Key finding: shift-closed Omega alone does NOT eliminate sorries because Set.univ mismatch persists. The viable path is Option B: add ShiftClosed Omega to valid/semantic_consequence definitions. The critical new insight is box_persistent (Box phi propagates across ALL times via TF axiom and its temporal dual), which enables a shifted truth lemma for the enlarged Omega. Estimated 18-27 hours for full implementation.

artifacts.summary: Mathematical analysis of shift-closed canonical Omega approach, proving it requires ShiftClosed condition on valid, with box_persistent lemma as key enabler and detailed implementation plan

partial_progress.details: All analysis complete, report written with concrete Lean implementation proposal
